feature_model.name: backup
feature_model.feature_tree: :r backup (backup) :m editor_config (editor_config) :m backup_extension (backup_extension) :o minutes (minutes) :m autosave (autosave) :o backup_onchange (backup_onchange) :o commands (commands) :m document_class (document_class) :m associated_file_ext (associated_file_ext) :o ext (ext) :o dos_unix_conversion (dos_unix_conversion) :o remove_blank_lines (remove_blank_lines) :o syntax_highlighting (syntax_highlighting) :m syntax_definition_file (syntax_definition_file) :o spell_check (spell_check) :g [1, 1] : file_bak_ext (file_bak_ext) : file_bak (file_bak) : file_ext_bak (file_ext_bak)
